data.title: Why The New Amazon Pharmacy Could Pose A Real Threat To Drugstores
data.text: In its latest disruptive move, Amazon on Tuesday unveiled Amazon Pharmacy that would make it possible for customers to buy prescription drugs on its site with Prime members getting unlimited, free two-day deliveries.

data.title: The latest battle between Walmart and Amazon
data.text: Stephanie Wissink, Jefferies, on what the latest battle between Amazon and Walmart means for the big box retailer. With CNBC's Dominic Chu and the Fast Money traders, Guy Adami, Tim Seymour, Dan Nathan and Karen Finerman.

data.title: Stock Markets Close Lower Tuesday; Amazon Disrupts Yet Another Industry
data.text: The fallback from record levels was modest.

data.title: Amazon's pharmacy move is a double negative for drug retailers: Analyst
data.text: John Ransom of Raymond James joins CNBC's Kelly Evans to discuss why Amazon's entry into pharmacies could be a blow to both retail and health care.

data.title: Amazon Opens an Online Pharmacy
data.text: The e-commerce giant's new pharmacy will deliver prescription drugs throughout most of the U.S.

data.title: Amazon Opens Online Pharmacy For Prescription Medication Delivery
data.text: The company said it will offer commonly prescribed medications with discounts to its Prime members.

data.title: Drug retailers feel the heat as Amazon launches online pharmacy
data.text: Shares of drug retailers such as CVS Health Corp (NYSE: CVS) and Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc. (NASDAQ: WBA) fell in the mid-day trading Tuesday following the news.

data.title: Amazon crashes online pharmacy business
data.text: Amazon.com, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMZN) announced Tuesday its long-anticipated push into retail pharmacy ordering, fulfillment and delivery with a service allowing its Prime members to order prescription drugs without insurance and have the drugs delivered to their homes in two days as part of their annual or monthly memberships. The service, called Amazon Pharmacy, can save Prime members up to 80% off the retail price of generic drugs and up to 40% off branded pharmaceuticals even for members who pay without using their insurance or who don't have coverage, the Seattle-based e-tailer said.

data.title: Better Buy: Amazon vs. Dollar General
data.text: One of these names is peaking, while the other is just hitting its stride.

data.title: Amazon Pharmacy News: What Drugs Are Available? How Does It Work?
data.text: After years of building, Amazon made a major splash in the pharmaceutical world on Tuesday when the company announced Amazon Pharmacy. The post Amazon Pharmacy News: What Drugs Are Available?

data.title: Amazon's Rivian-Built All-Electric Delivery Van Seen In The Wild
data.text: Amazon.com, Inc. (NASDAQ: AMZN) will eventually move to electric delivery vans as part of its long-term sustainability goal. The company will order 100,000 electric vans from electric vehicle startup Rivian, a company in which Amazon invested over $700 million.

data.title: Amazon Launches Online Pharmacy, Discount Pharma Prices Available For Prime Members Without Health Insurance
data.text: The world's richest man and CEO of Amazon, Jeff Bezos, has decided to further expand Amazon's offering.

data.title: Amazon's Big Push Into An Increasingly Competitive Digital-Pharmacy Market
data.text: Amazon is doubling down on its digital pharmacy service with a new benefit for Prime members announced on Tuesday (Nov. 17): two-day delivery of their prescriptions. The new Prime benefit comes care of the eCommerce giant's new separate storefront: Amazon Pharmacy.

data.title: Pharmacy Stocks Under Pressure 8% after Amazon's new pharmacy push
data.text: Shares of Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc (NASDAQ: WBA) lost more than 8% Tuesday morning after Amazon.com Inc. (NASDAQ: AMZN) announced two new offerings that would directly rival the legacy retail pharmacy company.  Amazon Pharmacy Amazon introduced in a Tuesday morning press release Amazon Pharmacy, a new store that lets customers complete their entire pharmacy transaction.

data.title: Jim Cramer on how Amazon Pharmacy will shake up the industry
data.text: Amazon is entering the pharmacy business with a new offering called Amazon Pharmacy, allowing customers in the United States to order prescription medications for home delivery, including free delivery for Amazon Prime members. CNBC's Jim Cramer, Carl Quintanilla and David Faber discuss.

data.title: Amazon Pharmacy Launches With Two-Day Prescription Delivery
data.text: Amazon is going all-in with its pharmacy vertical, launching a separate storefront with two-day prescription delivery for Prime members. “As more and more people look to complete everyday errands from home, pharmacy is an important and needed addition to the Amazon online store,” Doug Herrington, senior vice president of North American consumer, Amazon, said in […]

data.title: Amazon Is About To Disrupt The Pharmacy Business
data.text: Amazon Is About To Disrupt The Pharmacy Business. Amazon acquired PillPack in 2018 and will offer free Delivery for Amazon Prime Members

data.title: Amazon Turns Up The Heat On Brick-And-Mortar Retailers With New Online Pharmacy
data.text: The company will deliver prescriptions to U.S. consumers and offer discounts if paying without insurance.

data.text: Many investors underestimate how much this company stands to gain from a second round of coronavirus lockdowns.

data.title: Amazon Pharmacy will deliver your prescription medications
data.text: Prime members will get unlimited two-day delivery on pharmacy orders.

data.text: According to the GuruFocus scoreboard, Frank Sands (Trades, Portfolio) of Sands Capital Management ranks second among the gurus followed in terms of capital gains achieved over the past 10 years. He follows only David Tepper (Trades, Portfolio) of Appaloosa Management.

data.title: Amazon Pharmacy will ship prescriptions to Prime members
data.text: Amazon is making its biggest leap into the multi-billion-dollar health care industry with the launch of Amazon Pharmacy, a new digital drugstore.

data.title: Amazon Makes Bigger Push Into Pharmacy Business With Online Store
data.text: Amazon is launching a a new online store called “Amazon Pharmacy” that allows its U.S. customers to order prescription drugs for home delivery with its Prime customers getting free delivery.

data.title: Watch out CVS and Walgreens, Amazon Pharmacy is here
data.text: Here's what you need to know about Amazon's move to become the prescription drugs king. Amazon has officially launched Amazon Pharmacy, and with it, its hopes of dethroning CVS, Walgreens, and Walmart as the place where most Americans get their prescription drugs.

data.title: Amazon is now selling prescription drugs, and Prime members can get massive discounts if they pay without insurance
data.text: Amazon will start delivering prescription medication to its US customers starting Tuesday with the launch of its new service, Amazon Pharmacy. Amazon Prime members will be eligible for two-day delivery on medications, as well as price cuts on both generic and brand-name drugs.

data.title: Amazon launches online pharmacy store with discounts for Prime members
data.text: Amazon.com Inc. said Tuesday it is launching an Amazon Pharmacy online store that will allow customers get medications delivered without leaving their homes. Amazon Prime members will be entitled to free two-day delivery and up to 80% savings on medications when not using insurance.

data.title: Amazon launches online pharmacy in the United States
data.text: Amazon is entering the pharmacy business with a new offering called Amazon Pharmacy, allowing customers in the United States to order prescription medications for home delivery, including free delivery for Amazon Prime members. CNBC's Bertha Coombs reports.

data.title: Amazon launches online pharmacy in new contest with drug retail
data.text: Amazon.com Inc on Tuesday launched an online pharmacy for delivering prescription medications in the United States, increasing competition with drug retailers such as Walgreens, CVS and Walmart.

data.title: Amazon Pharmacy: Online drugstore and Prime Rx discounts extend tech giant's reach into healthcare
data.text: Amazon will offer prescription medications for home delivery through a new online drugstore, promising Prime members free two-day delivery and discounts of as much as 80% on medications purchased without insurance.

data.title: Amazon launches Amazon Pharmacy, a delivery service for prescription medications
data.text: A little over two years after its $753 million acquisition of the prescription medicine delivery service Pillpack, Amazon has finally launched Amazon Pharmacy, its online and mobile prescription medication ordering and fulfillment service. Using a secure pharmacy profile, customers can add their insurance information, manage prescriptions and choose payment options all through Amazon's service.

data.title: Amazon jumps into the pharmacy business with online prescription fulfillment, free delivery for Prime members
data.text: Amazon has been quietly building out its pharmacy offering for several years after ramping up internal discussions in 2017 and acquiring PillPack in 2018.

data.title: Introducing Amazon Pharmacy: Prescription Medications Delivered
data.text: SEATTLE--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Customers can now purchase prescription medications through Amazon Pharmacy – convenient and reliable access, without leaving home.

data.title: Amazon Named “Low Price Leader” in New Study
data.text: SEATTLE--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Amazon.com, Inc. (NASDAQ: AMZN) was named the low price leader in Profitero's annual “Price Wars” study. The comprehensive analysis, now in its fourth year, compares prices on over 18,400 products at Amazon, Walmart, Target, Staples, Home Depot, Wayfair, Macy's, Walgreen's, CVS, Kroger, Nordstrom, Best Buy, Lowes, and Chewy, and found Amazon offered customers the lowest prices most often and most consistently.
